subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: The 141st running of the Belmont Stakes began with Mine That Bird, the winner of the Kentucky Derby at 50-1 odds, a heavy favorite. But there are never any guarantees and plenty of surprises at the longest of the Triple Crown races.
snippet: The 141st running of the Belmont Stakes began with Mine That Bird, the winner of the Kentucky Derby at 50-1 odds, a heavy favorite. But there are never any guarantees and plenty of surprises at the longest of the Triple Crown races.
